sections.instructions: Questions 11–13: Choose the correct letter A, B or C. Questions 14–20: Write the correct letter A–I.
sections.title: Traffic Changes in Granford

questions.question: Why are changes needed to traffic systems in Granford?
options: A The number of traffic accidents has risen.
B The amount of traffic on the roads has increased.
C The types of vehicles on the roads have changed.

questions.question: In a survey, local residents particularly complained about
options: B pollution from trucks and lorries.

questions.question: According to the speaker, one problem with the new regulations will be
options: A raising money to pay for them.
B finding a way to make people follow them.
C getting the support of the police.

questions.question: New traffic lights
Pedestrian crossing
Parking allowed
New 'No Parking' sign
New disabled parking spaces
Widened pavement
Lorry loading/unloading restrictions

sections.instructions: Questions 21–25: Choose the correct letter A, B or C. Questions 26–30: Choose FIVE answers from the box.
sections.title: Investigating seed germination

questions.question: Why is Jack interested in investigating seed germination?
options: A He may do a module on a related topic later on.
B He wants to have a career in plant science.
C He is thinking of choosing this topic for his dissertation.

questions.question: Jack and Emma agree the main advantage of their present experiment is that it can be
options: B carried out inside the laboratory.
C completed in the time available.

questions.question: What do they decide to check with their tutor?
options: A whether their aim is appropriate
B whether anyone else has chosen this topic
C whether the assignment contributes to their final grade

questions.question: They agree that Graves’ book on seed germination is disappointing because
options: A it fails to cover recent advances in seed science.
B the content is irrelevant for them.
C its focus is very theoretical.

questions.question: What does Jack say about the article on seed germination by Lee Hall?
options: A The diagrams of plant development are useful.
B The analysis of seed germination statistics is thorough.
C The findings on seed germination after fires are surprising.

questions.question: Select seeds of different ____ and sizes.
Measure and record the ____ and size of each one.
Decide on the ____ to be used.
Use a different ____ for each seed and label it.
After about 3 weeks, record the plant’s ____.

sections.instructions: Write ONE WORD ONLY for each answer.
